name: intricacy
content:
intricacies [ plural ]
Add to word list
Add to word list
complicated details: I enjoyed the film, but I couldn't follow all the intricacies of the plot.
See more
[ U ] the quality of having a lot of complicated small parts or details: the intricacy of the needlework

a detail that is part of something complicated: No one could understand all the intricacies of the deal.
